channel.title: CVE Feed for WPMU DEV -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPMU DEV -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-44581|2024-08-03T13:54:03.943Z -- wpmu%20dev -- defender%20security
item.description: Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in WPMU DEV Defender Security allows : Screen Temporary Files for Sensitive Information.This issue affects Defender Security: from n/a through 3.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-37239|2024-08-02T03:50:55.194Z -- wpmu%20dev -- branda
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPMU DEV Branda allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Branda: from n/a through 3.4.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-31077|2024-08-02T01:46:04.186Z -- wpmu%20dev -- forminator
item.description: Forminator prior to 1.29.3 contains a SQL injection vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege may obtain and alter any information in the database and cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31857|2024-08-02T01:59:49.388Z -- wpmu%20dev -- forminator
item.description: Forminator prior to 1.15.4 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote attacker may obtain user information etc. and alter the page contents on the user's web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-25595|2024-07-25T13:39:38.515Z -- wpmu%20dev -- defender%20security
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in WPMU DEV Defender Security allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Defender Security: from n/a through 4.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-37239|2024-07-22T13:26:59.826Z -- wpmu%20dev -- branda
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPMU DEV Branda allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Branda: from n/a through 3.4.17.

item.title: CVE-2023-47189|2024-06-04T09:31:14.044Z -- wpmu%20dev -- defender%20security
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in WPMU DEV Defender Security allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Defender Security: from n/a through 4.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51542|2024-06-04T17:20:33.073Z -- wpmu%20dev -- branda
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in WPMU DEV Branda allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Branda: from n/a through 3.4.14.

item.title: CVE-2024-28890|2024-06-04T18:03:44.604Z -- wpmu%20dev -- forminator
item.description: Forminator prior to 1.29.0 contains an unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote attacker may obtain sensitive information by accessing files on the server, alter the site that uses the plugin, and cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-29777|2024-06-04T17:57:35.696Z -- wpmu%20dev -- forminator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPMU DEV Forminator allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Forminator: from n/a through 1.29.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32792|2024-06-10T17:07:34.134Z -- wpmu%20dev -- hummingbird
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPMU DEV Hummingbird.This issue affects Hummingbird: from n/a through 3.7.3.

item.description: Forminator prior to 1.29.3 contains a SQL injection vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege may obtain and alter any information in the database and cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
